details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-1:2014 - 7.2 Text - TOC structure
details.description: A TOC-related structure element should used in a way that conform to Table 333 in ISO 32000-1.

rule.description: TOCI elem should contained in TOC elem

error.message: TOCI elem not contained in TOC elem

rule.description: TOC elem may contain a Caption elem as it's first kid and TOC elem may contain only TOC and TOCI and Caption elems

error.message: TOC elem contains more than one Caption elem or TOC elem contains a Caption elem not as its first kid or TOC elem contains not a TOC or TOCI or Caption elems

rule.description: TOCI elem may contain only Reference and P and Lbl and TOC and NonStruct elems

error.message: TOCI elem contains not a Reference or P or Lbl or TOC or NonStruct elems
